1520980.name: Fate of WINDSHIFT Demo
1520980.description:
"The Country of wind" - The land is blessed with warm wind, rich soil all year around and a fruitful harvest is expected every year.
This country claims the largest territory in the world, various incidents occur on a daily basis due to immigrants, thieves, and even demons.
The 64th Platoon was a small unit organized to solve such cases, and all the members were strong men familiar with their work.
This is a "DEMO"game.
Today is the day of the platoon's holiday.you can enjoy 2 ways playing.
"Treasure hunt" and "Mission"
